trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There were no other sightings in Tucson on or around July 15th 1988
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Floating light approached me and then excellerated in to space
divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking out the garbage to the curb when I noticed a white light coming over the Santa Catalina Mountains and it was approaching my direction. At the time this was the outskirts of Tucson and it was dark and quiet in the area. I thought it was a search light from a hovering helicopter until I noticed that there was no sound but the light continued to move in my direction. The light eventually stopped roughly 200-300 feet away. The light remained in this position for 30-45 seconds, no movement just sitting in the same position. It suddenly excellerated straight up and disappeared in to the darkness. My heart was racing and the image has been burned in to mind ever since that day. I remember that I never noticed a sound nor did I ever see a distinct shape besides the white light, it was star-like in apperance.
